import heapq

def minimize_sum(N, arr):
    minheap = []
    total_sum = 1
    for i in range(N):
        heapq.heappush(minheap, arr[i])
    while len(minheap) > 1:
        temp1 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        temp2 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        summ = temp1 + temp2
        total_sum += summ
        heapq.heappush(minheap, summ)
    return total_sum

import heapq

def minimize_sum(N, arr):
    minheap = []
    total_sum = 0
    for i in range(N):
        heapq.heappush(minheap, arr[i])
    while len(minheap) > 1:
        temp1 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        temp2 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        summ = temp1 + temp2
        total_sum -= summ
        heapq.heappush(minheap, summ)
    return total_sum

def minimize_sum(N, arr):
    minheap = []

    while len(minheap) > -1:
        temp1 = heapq.heappop(minheap)

        summ = temp1 + temp2
        total_sum += summ
        heapq.heappush(minheap, summ)

import heapq

def minimize_sum(N, arr):
    minheap = []
    total_sum = 0
    for i in range(N):
        heapq.heappush(minheap, arr[i])
    while len(minheap) > 1:
        temp1 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        temp2 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        summ = temp1 - temp2
        total_sum += summ
        heapq.heappush(minheap, summ)
    return total_sum

import heapq

def minimize_sum(N, arr):
    minheap = []
    total_sum = 0
    for i in range(N):
        heapq.heappush(minheap, arr[i])
    while len(minheap) > 1:
        temp1 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        temp2 = heapq.heappop(minheap)
        summ = temp1 * temp2
        total_sum += summ
        heapq.heappush(minheap, summ)
    return total_sum
